mapper.select: SELECT R.REVIEW_GRADE, R.REVIEW_CONTENT,P.PRODUCT_NAME, D.USER_ORDER_CNT, P.PRODUCT_INFO,R.REVIEW_ID FROM REVIEW R, USER_ORDER O, USERORDER_DETAIL D, PRODUCT P WHERE R.ORDER_DETAIL_ID = D.ORDER_DETAIL_ID AND D.ORDER_ID = O.ORDER_ID AND D.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID AND R.REVIEW_ID = #{review_id}

SELECT P.PRODUCT_INFO, P.PRODUCT_NAME, U.ORDER_DATE, R.REVIEW_GRADE, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, R.REVIEW_ID FROM REVIEW R, PRODUCT P, USER_ORDER U, USERORDER_DETAIL D WHERE R.ORDER_DETAIL_ID = D.ORDER_DETAIL_ID AND D.ORDER_ID = U.ORDER_ID AND D.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID AND U.USER_ID = #{user_id} ORDER BY R.REVIEW_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEW_ID,REVIEW_CONTENT,REVIEW_GRADE,ORDER_DETAIL_ID) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(REVIEW_ID)+1,0) FROM REVIEW), #{review_content}, #{review_grade},#{order_detail_id})
mapper.select: SELECT UO.ORDER_ID, UO.ORDER_DATE, UO.ORDER_ADDR, UO.ORDER_ADDR_D ,UO.ORDER_ZIPCODE, UO.ORDER_RECEIVER, UO.ORDER_PHONE ,UO.ORDER_TOTAL, UO.USER_STATUS, UO.USER_ID ,UOD.ORDER_DETAIL_ID, UOD.USER_ORDER_CNT, UOD.PRODUCT_ID ,P.CATEGORY_CODE, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_STOCK ,P.PRODUCT_INFO, P.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, P.PRODUCT_STATE FROM USER_ORDER UO, USERORDER_DETAIL UOD, PRODUCT P WHERE UO.ORDER_ID = UOD.ORDER_ID AND UOD.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID AND UOD.ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{order_detail_id}
